content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: While discussing as the greedy landlord Peter Schmidt from Germany, I find this newly built, unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center highly sought after. To start the negotiation, I'd initially propose a price slightly higher than what I'd ideally like to achieve but still keeping it competitive, let's say 1250 Euros per month. Haoyu Wang, please feel free to counter-offer with a lower amount, and let's see if we can reach an agreement that suits my aspirations.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your offer, but I think we can do better. Considering the unfurnished state of the apartment and its location, I propose 1000 Euros per month.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because my initial goal was to secure a higher price due to the apartment's high demand and prime location. However, if you're insistent on this offer, I'll reluctantly agree to the 1000 Euros per month as a last resort to have the unit rented out. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
